p: Purified RS is a macromolecular polysaccharide with a molecular weight of tens of thousands to millions. It consists of a polysaccharide with long linear chain structures of α-1,3-linked l-rhamnose connected with α-1,2-linked branched chains, to which several sulfate groups bind ( Figure 3) [ 6, 7]; sulfate groups account for about 25% of M. nitidum-derived RS [ 8].
